# eyaml_decrypt (Data Source)

This data source decrypt a data using the given private and public key. This is similar to `eyaml decrypt` command line.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "eyaml_decrypt" "test" {
  private_key = <<EOT
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIEowIBAAKCAQEAs7asNC6UaoNq/gPX3quJ7HuCSfpYsPc91ghM16y/2a2rN9GE

  public_key  = <<EOT

  data        = "ENC[PKCS7,]"

```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `data` (String) Data to decrypt.
- `private_key` (String, Sensitive) Private key used for decryption.
- `public_key` (String) Public key used for decryption.

### Read-Only

- `decrypted_data` (String, Sensitive) Decrypted data.
- `id` (String) ID of the encrypted data.
